Do not define components during render. React will see a new component type on every render and destroy the entire subtree‚Äôs DOM nodes and state (https://reactjs.org/docs/reconciliation.html#elements-of-different-types). Instead, move this component definition out of the parent component ‚ÄúRemoveOrgScreen‚Äù and pass data as props. If you want to allow component creation in props, set allowAsProps option to true.

suggestions.desc: Use `unknown` instead, this will force you to explicitly, and safely assert the type is correct.
Use `never` instead, this is useful when instantiating generic type parameters that you don't need to know the type of.

messages.message: Unexpected any value in conditional. An explicit comparison or type cast is required.

suggestions.desc: Explicitly cast value to a boolean (`Boolean(value)`)

messages.message: ["avatar_1"] is better written in dot notation.

fix.text: getDatabase, ref, get, set, update, remove, Database

messages.message: Unexpected object value in conditional. The condition is always true.
Unexpected object value in conditional. The condition is always true.
